page.title: 09INDUSTRY
page.content: {Weardale Mining and Processing Ltd.} have a mine, a plant and their main office at West Blackdene. 14 people are employed in the mine, 28 in the plant and there are 7 administrative staff. The plant also provides work for road hauliers. The mine produces fluorspar with galena(lead ore) as a by-product. There is a separation plant and a fluorspar processing and briquetting plant whiich produces high grade ovoid briquettes for use as fluxing agents in steel making and foundry operations. {Burnhope Reservoir}is shared by the Sunderland and South Shields and Northumbrian Water Authorities. 8 men work in the filter house which is run by the Sunderland and South Shields Water Authority who then supply the Northumbrian Water Authority with some of the water. 5 work at the reservoir.
